content.query:
select top 100 *
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://accsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseroot/delta/delta-table-2939450/',
    format = 'delta') as rows

select top 100 *
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://accsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseroot/delta/delta-table-136072/',
    format = 'delta') as rows


select top 100 *
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://accsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseroot/nycdelta/yellowweather/',
    format = 'delta') as rows
